commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The final checks for Rina's live show are all done. I better check one more time just to be safe. Then I'll go home.)

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Found you. Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, hey Rina. What's up? It's pretty late. You should get home and rest up for tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I need to talk to you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh? Is there something you wanted to check before the show? Ask me anything. I'm just finishing up the final checks now.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: No, it's not that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then what is it?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I don't know how to say it... I want to express something. Rina-chan Board says, "Tense."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want you to see it before the show tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! Me?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want you to be the first person to see me perform without my Rina-chan Board.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina... Sure, absolutely! Let's go someplace with a little more space.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thank you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks for waiting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This is pretty scary. I can't relax without my Board. But...this is me. I want everyone to know who I am.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll do my best to make it the most wonderful performance I can put on. I'll make sure it's fun.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You can do anything you set your mind to, Rina. You're super excited right now, aren't you?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Huh? You can tell?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup! I can't wait to see you sing and dance! I can feel your heart. And I have proof.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Proof?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What does my face look like?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You look happy. Oh, that's what you mean.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: My face looks the way your heart feels.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If you get nervous tomorrow, just look at the faces of all of your fans. You'll be able to see if your hearts are connected or not.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You're right. Okay, I'll do that. But before that, watch me perform.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Got it!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll going to sing just for you now.
